fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Float outside two houses at night, roleblocking all visitors to those houses through immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Since you are a fragile balloon, if you are attacked, you will always die.
- Roleblock Immunity
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
